title: Forgot My E-mail'Password...
body: Hello,Support!!!So I wanted to change my password on my acc cuz someone other plays in it...But I can't remember my email's password..Can u help me to recover it?

replies.body: That's definitely not good if someone else was able to get into your account! Reach out to our account team asap in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help make sure you're safe and help reverse any damage that might have been done!
